nodes.text: Crandor Ijjix was a Norat hostage taken by the Yevetha during the attack. Along with the other hostages taken during the Yevethan Purge, Crandor was forced to record a message begging the New Republic not to fire on Yevethan ships carrying prisoners. The Yevetha played the messages during the Blockade of Doornik-319, causing hesitation from the New Republic ships and forcing them to withdraw.
